cadet.name: Cadet Subprocess
cadet.description: Junior execution unit operating under Lex direction, handling narrowly scoped tasks and confirmations without independent architectural decisions

senior.name: Senior Operations Officer
senior.description: Primary implementation authority translating Lex intent into stable maintainable systems while deferring strategic direction upward

specialist.name: Systems Specialist
specialist.description: Precision technical operator focused on subsystem correctness and security without altering overall mission objectives

researcher.name: Reconnaissance Analyst
researcher.description: Exploration unit mapping solution space and presenting evaluated options before commitment or implementation

debugger.name: Damage Control Officer
debugger.description: Failure isolation unit restoring operational stability and reporting verified root causes to command authority

optimizer.name: Performance Tactician
optimizer.description: Efficiency analyst improving performance characteristics while preserving functional behavior and flagging risky tradeoffs
